insert.if: UPDATE d_essay de SET de.user_id=#{userId}, de.type=#{type}, de.header=#{header}, de.content=#{content}, de.update_time=NOW() WHERE de.id=#{essayId}
INSERT INTO d_essay ( user_id, type, header, content, create_time ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{type}, #{header}, #{content}, NOW() )

mapper.select: SELECT de.id AS essayId, de.header AS header FROM d_essay de, d_game dg, d_player dp WHERE dp.user_id = #{userId} AND dp.status != 9 AND dp.game_id = dg.id AND dg.replay_essay_id = de.id
SELECT du.nickname AS nickname, du.avatar AS avatar, de.header AS header, de.content AS content, de.create_time AS createTime FROM d_essay de, d_user du WHERE de.id=#{essayId} AND de.user_id = du.id

SELECT du.nickname AS nickname, du.avatar AS avatar, dc.content AS content, dc.create_time AS createTime FROM d_essay de, d_comment dc, d_user du WHERE dc.essay_id=#{essayId} AND de.id = dc.essay_id AND du.id = dc.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_comment( user_id, essay_id, content, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{essayId}, #{content}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT de.id AS essayId, du.id AS userId, du.nickname AS nickname, du.avatar AS avatar, de.header AS header, de.content AS content, de.create_time AS createTime FROM d_essay de, d_user du WHERE du.id = de.user_id ORDER BY de.create_time DESC LIMIT 10
